thread.title: Chinese Ad Company Sorry for Code to Snoop Apple User Data
thread.title_full: Chinese Ad Company Sorry for Code to Snoop Apple User Data - WSJ

author: Josh Chin
title: Chinese Ad Company Sorry for Code to Snoop Apple User Data
text:
BEIJING—A Chinese mobile-advertising company has apologized for disseminating code that allowed hundreds of applications that run on Apple Inc.’s iOS mobile system to access users’ personal data, in violation of Apple’s App Store policy.
The advertising company, closely held Guangzhou Youmi Mobile Technology Co., offered “sincere apologies” in a statement on Tuesday after Apple said it had removed offerings from the App Store that... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
